item.title: Using Social Media takes 20% of your Australian day
item.description: Australians spend 1 in 5 minutes using social media sites. Social Networking usage was about 22% in December 2010 says comScore.

item.title: 50 Completely Useful stats for social media & mobile marketing
item.description: To understand more about Social Media and Mobile Marketing its important to get a few facts together on current trends and insights.

item.title: What kids do online: UK Internet Usage
item.description: Recent indepth report from New Media Age in the UK focused on the internet usage habits of kids.
